content.question: A motor-powered conveyor belt exerts a horizontal force <math alttext="F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi></math> on a box of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math>, as shown. The conveyor belt moves the box a distance <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math> in a time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>. Which expression is equal to the power delivered to the box?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction m g d over t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the fraction F d over t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator open parenthesis, F minus m g, close parenthesis, times d, and denominator t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>F</mi><mo>âˆ’</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator open parenthesis, F plus m g, close parenthesis, times d, and denominator t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>F</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction F d over t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
